title: Riddhi Bahadur Malla
text:
Subba Riddhi Bahadur Malla (; 1898–1968) was a <a href="Nepali%20language">Nepali</a> writer.
Malla was born on 8 December 1898 in <a href="Varanasi">Benaras</a>, <a href="British%20India">British India</a>. His sons, <a href="Govinda%20Bahadur%20Malla">Govinda Bahadur Malla</a> and <a href="Bijaya%20Malla">Bijaya Malla</a> are also renowned writers. He founded the "<a href="Sarada%20%28magazine%29">Sarada</a>", a Nepali-language magazine during the <a href="Rana%20dynasty">Rana-era</a>.
